title: Israel advances bill for authority over West Bank heritage, archaeology sites
description: Seven MKs voted in favor of the bill, and five MKs opposed it. It will need to pass three readings in the Knesset’s plenum to become a law.

title: Texas Law Barring State Investment in Firms Boycotting Fossil Fuels Declared Unconstitutional
description: A federal judge has declared a 2021 Texas law unconstitutional

title: Texas law barring state investment in firms boycotting fossil fuels declared unconstitutional
description: A federal district judge on Wednesday declared a 2021 law restricting state investments in companies boycotting the fossil fuel industry unconstitutional, calling...

title: Texas law barring state investment in firms boycotting fossil fuels declared unconstitutional
description: A federal judge has declared a 2021 Texas law unconstitutional. The law restricted state investments in companies boycotting the fossil fuel industry. On Wednesday, U.S. District Judge Alan Albright ruled that the law was "facially overbroad" and violated the First...

title: Texas law barring state investment in firms boycotting fossil fuels declared unconstitutional
description: A federal district judge on Wednesday declared a 2021 law restricting state investments in companies boycotting the fossil fuel industry unconstitutional, calling it “facially overbroad” and citing First and Fourteenth Amendment concerns.
